metadata.synopsis: Mike Ribble (Burt Lancaster) is a hard-drinking tent pitcher. His career as a famous trapeze artist ended years ago after attempting a triple somersault gave him a permanent limp. Young acrobat Tino (Tony Curtis) tracks Mike down and asks him to teach him the dangerous stunt. Mike first refuses but is convinced by his ex-lover, Rosa (Katy Jurado). Mike and Tino have a shot at the big time, but the two men are driven apart by the scheming of Lola (Gina Lollobrigida), an Italian trampolinist.

reviews: Enjoyable trash: Carol Reed's circus melodrama is one of his most commercially successful but artistically weakest film; there's more erotic tension between Burt Lancaster and Tony Curtis than between either man and love interest Gina Lillobrigida.
Tacky circus thriller and overwrought love triangle melodrama.
Boas atuaes de Lancaster e Curtis (alm de Lollobrigida, detestvel em boa parte do filme) e timas cenas no trapzio. O final  um pouco decepcionante, mas, no geral, o filme prende e  bem realizado.
